# init(device:delegate:)

**Initializer**

Creates an object to manage phone calls on a hands-free Bluetooth device.

## Declaration

```swift
init!(device: IOBluetoothDevice!, delegate: Any!)
```

## Parameters

- **device**: A Bluetooth device.
- **delegate**: A delegate that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.iobluetooth/documentation/IOBluetooth/IOBluetoothHandsFreeDeviceDelegate] protocol.
title: init(device:delegate:)
